settings.custom_html:
Ikiru is a curated home decor store where we firmly believe that everyone deserves great designs.
Connecting with a fresh audience and introducing them to our curated collection is what excites us the most,
and we are looking for partners who can help us to achieve this.

settings.title: Welcome to Ikiru Affiliate Program
settings.custom_html:
Ikiru Affiliate program offers bloggers, content creators, publisher’s and influencers an opportunity to monetize their traffic.
Here is how you can be a part of our affiliate program.

settings.heading: Affiliate program explained
settings.subheading:
Once you sign up for IKIRU affiliate program, you will be able to generate your own unique affiliate link. You can then add the link to your website, social media, blog, or posts- totally upto you!

Whenever someone uses your “unique link” to make a purchase from our website, you will get a commission on their order, simple!

settings.title: Wait, here is what all we have for you!
settings.custom_html:
1. Exciting commission % that can go upto 10% per transaction.
2. Exclusive offers and discounts for your audience.
3. Real time tracking, and timely reports.
4. Details of our latest offers, campaigns, and discounts.
5. Dedicated support team from Ikiru.
